codeSystems.name: ApgarTimingVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - APGAR Score Timing
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent standard timings for APGAR assessments.

codeSystems.name: BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Birth and Fetal Death Financial Class
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent birth and fetal death financial class. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClass_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=D20CD804-8487-E311-AE2A-0017A477041A).

codeSystems.name: BirthAttendantTitlesVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Birth Attendants Titles
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthAttendantTitles_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=7B108BDB-5F50-482F-9E9D-643EC75364A2)

codeSystems.name: BirthDeliveryOccurredVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Birth Delivery Occurred
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of place where birth or delivery occurred. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthDeliveryOccurred_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BC64CB23-8210-4CE0-B2AE-F45169BBDC51)

codeSystems.name: BirthWeightEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Birth Weight Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Birth Weight Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthWeightEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=FA7A83A3-FCFD-E611-A856-0017A477041A)

codeSystems.name: DeliveryRoutesVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Delivery Routes
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Delivery Routes. This valueset is based on [PHVS_DeliveryRoutes_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=0C9E4D45-3FFD-4E97-AEF3-18CE5B878F46)

codeSystems.name: EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_EstimateOfGestationEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7567)

codeSystems.name: FetalDeathCauseOrConditionVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Fetal Death Cause or Condition
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death cause or condition.  This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalDeathCauseOrCondition_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=DC1C6A94-C9FF-42CD-B546-E789003ED793).

codeSystems.name: FetalDeathTimePointsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Fetal Death Time Points
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death time points. This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalDeathTimePoints_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=52F8C812-2C70-4038-8F0F-D6E0532D4EBD)

codeSystems.name: FetalPresentationsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Fetal Presentations
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalPresentations_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=3C696B7B-BB33-4818-8996-1E3461E3F512)

codeSystems.name: HistologicalPlacentalExaminationVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Histological Placental Examination
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent histological placental examinations. This valueset is based on [PHVS_HistologicalPlacentalExamination_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=82BF4C7F-D01F-4019-A1E1-9F7CAACB7FC6)

codeSystems.name: InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth. This valueset is based on [PHVS_InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirth_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=AEF5A3D4-960C-4194-8BB6-392C7282D216). Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

codeSystems.name: InformantRelationshipToMotherVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Informant Relationship to Mother
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent informants relationship to mother. This valueset is based on [PHVS_InformantRelationshiptoMother_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=ADF95682-912A-E711-BE3F-0017A477041A).

codeSystems.name: LocationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Location Types
codeSystems.description: Valueset for location types used to differentate transfer and birth locations

codeSystems.name: MethodOfDispositionVS
codeSystems.title: Method of Disposition VS
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Fetal Remains Method of Disposition. This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalRemainsDispositionMethod_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7585)

codeSystems.name: NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Newborn Congenital Anomalies
codeSystems.description: The valueset contains codes to represent newborn congenital anomalies. This valueset is based on [PHVS_NewbornCongenitalAnomalies_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BC64CB23-8210-4CE0-B2AE-F45169BBDC51). Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

codeSystems.name: NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_NumberOfPreviousCesareansEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=C5BC6D8B-DDFA-E611-A856-0017A477041A)

codeSystems.name: ObstetricProcedureVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Obstetric Procedures
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent obstetric procedures. This valueset is based on [PHVS_ObstetricProcedures_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=6D41E52D-2415-4EC4-A38A-87B0FEC503FB)

codeSystems.name: ValueSetObstetricProcedureOutcome
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Obstetric Procedure Outcome
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes that represent the successful or unsuccessful outcome of an obstretric procedure

codeSystems.name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_PregnancyReportEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BD25B456-85EC-45D7-B578-1024EE2920F4). Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits

codeSystems.name: CigaretteSmokingBeforeAndDuringPregnancyVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet - Cigarette Smoking Before and During Pregnancy
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent the number of cigarettes smoked in specific periods before and during pregnancy.
